snippet.name: CustomPlugin
snippet.starttext:
<!-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Author 	 :	$${Author}
Date     :	$${DATE}
Description : 			
 $${Plugin Description}
		
Modification History:

----------------------------------------------------------------------->
<cfcomponent name="$${Plugin Name}" 
			 hint="$${Hint}" 
			 extends="coldbox.system.plugin" 
			 output="false" 
			 autowire="$${Autowire:false|true}"
			 cache="$${Cache:true|false}"
			 cacheTimeout="$${Cache Timeout:0}">
  
<!------------------------------------------- CONSTRUCTOR ------------------------------------------->	
   
    <cffunction name="init" access="public" returntype="$${Plugin Name}" output="false">
		<cfargument name="controller" type="any" required="true">
		<cfscript>
  		super.Init(arguments.controller);
  		setpluginName("$${Plugin Name}");
  		setpluginVersion("$${Plugin Version}");
  		setpluginDescription("$${Plugin Description}");
  		//My own Constructor code here
  		
  		//Return instance
  		return this;
		</cfscript>
	</cffunction>

<!------------------------------------------- PUBLIC ------------------------------------------->	

    
<!------------------------------------------- PRIVATE ------------------------------------------->	

	
</cfcomponent>
